name: Project Battle Network
description:
My goal was to recreate the battle system of the Megaman Battle Network series.

 I made this project by myself (except art and sound)

The game is a kind of RPG with a deck system. The battle takes place on a grid, red for you and blue for enemies. 

Your goal is to delete every virus in the least amount of time! Try to get every stars!

The in game tutorial is in French (sorry xD) but here is a small summary if you never play MMBN :

There are 2 phases : Custom phase and Battle phase.

In the custom phase you can choose chips to attack. You can only take different chips if they have the same Code ( "Cannon A" and "Recover10 A") or if the chip are identical ( "Cannon A" and "CannonB").

Then you can use them to attack viruses. To return in Custom phase, you must wait until the custom bar (at the top of the screen) is full.

Controls :

Arrow : Move 

Left Shift : Select chip / Use chip

Left Control : Cancel / Buster

W : Info / Open Custom Screen
